title: Iron Man: Genius, Billionaire, Playboy, Philanthropist
author: Tony Stark
content: Iron Man is a technological marvel, equipped with a high-tech suit of armor that grants him flight, super strength, and advanced weaponry. Tony Stark, the brilliant mind behind the suit, is a complex and charismatic figure.

title: The Unstoppable Hulk
author: Bruce Banner
content: The Hulk is a green, rage-fueled powerhouse with incredible strength and durability. When mild-mannered scientist Bruce Banner becomes enraged, he transforms into this monstrous hero.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
author: Steve Rogers
content: Captain America is a symbol of American ideals, possessing peak human physical condition, exceptional leadership skills, and unwavering determination. Enhanced by the Super Soldier Serum, he is a fearless defender of liberty.

title: Thor: God of Thunder
author: Thor Odinson
content: Thor is a powerful Asgardian warrior with superhuman strength, durability, and the ability to control lightning. Wielding the mighty hammer Mjolnir, he protects Earth and the Nine Realms.
